item.title: Infinity Nikki: 9 Places You Should Visit As Soon As Possible
item.description:
Summary

  • Exciting quests in the open-world game Infinity Nikki encourage exploration and adventure for all players.
  • Key locations like Dream Warehouse, Bug Catcher's Cabin, and Ruins Plaza offer unique challenges and rewards.
  • Visiting areas like Breezy Meadow and Queens Palace provide plenty of opportunities for exploration and hidden treasures.

Open-world games are the best type of game and when they are not only available to play on multiple platforms but also free-to-play, said games instantly soar in popularity. No wonder, then, that Infinity Nikki has excited players of all experiences and ages, with awe-inspiring quests that encourage exploration, adventure, and Bunny Fluff at every turn.

Together with her adorable cat Momo, Nikki is first presented to players in her default outfit: pink heels and a skirt, a white blouse, and socks. As Nikki is a highly experienced stylist, the option to change her appearance occurs regularly for players throughout the game. Whether players are new, or else are revisiting the game and wondering how to play differently, it always pays to know of the compulsory locations to visit should they want the full Infinity Nikki experience.

9 Dream Warehouse

Angelically Ethereal

The beautiful Dream Warehouse is co-managed by the Faewish Sprites and the everyday citizens of Florawish themselves. Dream Warehouse has been destroyed and subsequently rebuilt twice: once during the War of Descendants and before that, at the beginning of Veilfall.

Due to the fact that it is the most historically relevant structure in the whole of Florawish, there are many levels to Dream Warehouse. What is more, three different sketches are available to collect here; Ceremony Guest, Cool Shade, and Sincere Greetings. Accessing the warehouse is somewhat tricky, so players should make sure they are entirely au fait with the jumping mechanisms and timings before they head over to the two Warp Spires. The calming vibes of the entire area, on each and every level, are almost ethereal and well worth a visit.

8 Bug Catchers Cabin

Meet Kourtin & His Quiz

Located in the center of Breezy Meadow, the Bug Catcher's Cabin is owned and lived in by the mysterious Kourtin and after players answer Kouritin's questionnaire correctly, they will be awarded the important Guest Star sketch.

Directly north of the Bugs Catcher Cabin, players are faced with the particularly challenging Curio Domain, but when completed, they are given a Whimstar. The best hack for completion here is, when taking the first platform jump, to utilize the floating ability Nikki is known for. When taking the photograph of the Cabin, make sure to have the entire windmill in the center of the frame else collecting it will not be possible.

7 Ruins Plaza Corner

Ancient Florawish Site

In total, there are forty different expedition photographs available in Infinity Nikki, with a secret bonus spot that only unlocks once players have collected the other forty. Additionally, the collection of Whimstars is also important to thorough gameplay and the one located inside the Ruins Plaza is one of the hardest to access.

The Ruins Plaza Corner is situated in the far corner of the northwestern side of Florawish, with the Whimstar itself sitting atop the Circular Plaza's central dome. Pro tip: Instead of heading straight inside, buttslam through the boards on the top, which will gain players access to the Whimstar.

6 Breezy Meadow

Florawish's Nature Hub

By far the largest area in terms of open exploration in the game, Breezy Meadow is a sprawling meadow filled with grass, flowers, and scenic spots. Residents of Florawish from across the nation flock to Breezy Meadow for picnics, fishing days, and general rest and recuperation.

Technically, Breezy Meadow is a separate area entirely, although it is widely recognized that the entire meadow is still under the rule of the official government of Florawish. There are an impressive fourteen different Warp Spires in the area, including four in the Queen's Palace section alone.

5 Queens Palace

Treasure Off The Beaten Path

Queen's Palace, sitting centrally inside Breezy Meadow, is a favorite spot among players no matter how many times they play the game through and it is easy to see why. Time-consuming but totally worth it, it takes a couple of hours to fully explore Queen's Palace.

Players shouldn't be looking for an official quest to take them here, however. Instead, either whilst working the way through the main story, or else after completion, head to Breezy Meadow and discover the Palace area separately. Not only are there a whole host of Whimstars, but also several intriguing chests and more than a couple Dews too.

4 Blossom Forest

Stunning Blossom-Inspired Outfits

A clear favorite of players, Blossom Forest is a true sensory experience as soon as the area comes on-screen. Blossom Forest is so notable in Infinity Nikki that there are several outfit items to collect and wear that are directly inspired by the natural beauty there.

To craft the stunning Departing Blossom outfit, for example, players need to head to the northern part of the Wishing Woods. Here, they should forge a trusted bond with the Faerish Sprites who live there, who will subsequently help create this truly breathtaking outfit.

3 Sanctum Of The Observant

Society of Observers' Headquarters

When players first arrive at the Sanctum of the Observant, they may mistakenly believe the main building is nothing but a pile of ruins. Located in the area of Florawish overseen by Calmato, the Sanctum of the Observant is packed full of Impressions to collect.

Located in front of the Observant Warp Spire, the Church itself serves as a real inspiration for Nikki and other passionate stylists. Run by the esteemed Society of Observers, the Sanctum is the central hub for everything relating to the stylist world and surges development in different looks through Impressions.

2 Realm Of Nourishment

Exchange Items for Insight

In Infinity Nikki , there are so many beautiful outfits and accessories for players to dress their character in that, often, they have their preferences and conversely, their dislikes. Here, at the Realm of Nourishment, any collected items found anywhere across Florawish can be handed in and swapped for Insight.

What is more, once players reach Mira Level 15 or higher, the percentage of Insight received from each exchange increases dramatically.

1 Wish Celebration Center

Wishful Aurosa Reward

To gain access to the Wish Celebration Center, players must first arrive in the Wishing Woods, and then make their way to Heartcraft Kingdom. From here, teleport to the official Wish Celebration Center Warp Spire and walk until players can see Aventura.

Conversing with Aventura, players will be asked a question and as long as they answer correctly, they will be handsomely rewarded. To reach Wish Celebration Center, players must first successfully embark upon the subquest from Chapter 8: Wishful Aurosa.

item.title: Open World Games With The Best Motorcycle Gameplay
item.description:
Summary

  • Motorcycle gameplay in video games offers a sense of freedom in stunning open worlds.
  • The Los Angeles map and vehicular gameplay of Midnight Club: Los Angeles laid the foundation for Grand Theft Auto 5 .
  • Days Gone makes the motorcycle into a pivotal part of the post-apocalyptic survival gameplay.

Motorcycles are often described as two wheels that move the soul, and video games capture this feeling through the ability to ride them. Riding motorcycles in video games gives players a sense of freedom as they make their way through beautiful landscapes, especially when navigating a fully explorable open-world map.

In many video games that allow for vehicular traversal, cars are often the star, while motorcycles are a nice addition for those who prefer smaller and more maneuverable vehicles. Meanwhile, other games make it a large focus of their games, from racing games to action-packed crime thrillers.

8 Saints Row

The Divisive Reboot Still Features Fun Vehicular Mayhem

Freedom has always been a large part of the Saints Row series, allowing players to follow the story or go off and be as chaotic as they wish. The 2022 reboot continues to embrace this style, with the player able to go off and explore the fictional city of Santo Ileso, which is heavily inspired by Las Vegas.

Saints Row games are always going to be compared to games like Grand Theft Auto , with the ability to hijack any car or bike seen on the streets and go on any mission or activity. Motorcycle gameplay controls were improved from their predecessors, with tight controls that can allow for racing, getaways, and more.

7 Midnight Club: Los Angeles

Rockstar Ended The Midnight Club Series With A Bang

The final entry in the series, Midnight Club: Los Angeles continued to expand on the formula established in previous games to create a fun, open-world racing experience. Anyone who has played games such as Need For Speed will get the gist of what Midnight Club: Los Angeles has to offer, including a simple story in which the player rises to become the top racer in Los Angeles.

In addition to the numerous fast cars available in Midnight Club: Los Angeles , players can also ride motorcycles as they explore the surprisingly detailed open world of Los Angeles. Since Rockstar developed the game, it can be seen as a precursor to Los Santos in Grand Theft Auto V, which came out just five years later.

6 The Crew: Motorfest

Oahu Proves To Be The Best Place For Bikes

Ubisoft's Ivory Tower has developed The Crew: Motorfest , which shifts the focus to a car festival located on the island of Oahu in Hawaii. The smaller yet fully explorable island, compared to the previous scaled-down version of the United States, has allowed Ivory Tower to concentrate on enhancing the game’s controls and stunning visuals.

The Crew: Motorfest arguably has the best handling in the trilogy thus far, with a proper selection of cars, old and new, trucks, powerboats, buggies, planes, and motorcycles to unlock and upgrade. With a wide variety of playlists to enjoy with other players, Ubisoft continues to improve as the series goes on.

5 Sleeping Dogs

A Memorable Crime-Thriller Set In Hong Kong

Sleeping Dogs was unfairly disregarded by gamers as a Grand Theft Auto clone when it came out. While there are similarities, Sleeping Dogs provided gameplay elements that were ahead of their time, such as the over-the-shoulder third-person action that GTA would eventually take on. Martial arts are a major part of the combat, which very few games managed to pull off at the time.

Hong Kong is an exciting world to explore in Sleeping Dogs. The game features impressive NPC animations, highly detailed environments, and a captivating main story about an undercover cop. Additionally, the motorcycle controls are smoother than those found in most games from that era.

4 Watch Dogs: Legion

Fight For The Freedom Of London As Any Civilian

Given the dystopian near-future London that Watch Dogs: Legion takes place in, with the totalitarian security forces of Albion locking the streets down, especially with checkpoints, it’s arguably better to use motorcycles to get around. They are fast, agile, and have some of the best handling in the game when trying to evade Albion and other evil factions.

Thanks to the unique NPC mechanic of being able to recruit anybody off the streets of London, some agents of DeadSec come with motorcycles that can be summoned. The recruitment mechanic became the main gimmick of Watch Dogs: Legion , allowing no two playthroughs to be alike aside from the major plot points.

3 Grand Theft Auto 5

Los Santos Is Teeming With Life And Activities

Grand Theft Auto practically revolutionized open-world vehicle traversal, but motorcycles were never a strong suit until Grand Theft Auto 5 . The tighter controls compared to its predecessors allowed them to shine more, especially in certain story missions like heists, where getting away on motorcycles is required.

In general, Grand Theft Auto 5 improved on nearly every kind of vehicle gameplay on land, air, and sea. This, along with a cinematic storyline and unforgettable characters, is one of many enhancements from previous games that contributed to making Grand Theft Auto 5 one of the best-selling games of all time.

2 Cyberpunk 2077

The Future Is Dark Tet Beautiful In Night City

Even at its buggy and notorious launch in 2020, Cyberpunk 2077 featured reliable vehicle controls for cars and motorcycles. Motorcycles played a big part in the game’s marketing, including models designed for Keanu Reeves’ company Arch, and roaming Night City on them remains an exhilarating experience, especially in the much-improved version of the game.

The vehicles are just one component of Cyberpunk 2077 , with the bulk of the game being one of the most ambitious RPGs of the modern age, mixing robotics, hacking, guns, and so much more. Despite its rough launch, CD Projekt Red turned the game around and gave fans the game they were originally promised and more.

1 Days Gone

The Bike Is The Ultimate Zombie Apocalypse Tool

In most games, motorcycles are a welcome bonus, but Days Gone revolves almost entirely around Deacon St. John and his motorcycle. After the apocalypse, Deacon, played tremendously by Sam Witwer, is now a biker wandering the rural areas of Oregon, helping other survivors by doing jobs on the open road as zombie-like infected known as Freakers roam.

The motorcycle that Deacon rides in Days Gone is not just for transportation. It is how the player saves, and it is essential to survival, especially when swarms of Freakers attack. The player even has to repair the bike with scraps and refill the fuel tank when needed. It also provides realistic gameplay, with the bike accurately moving how it would through the various hazards and environments, from the roads to muddy hills.

item.title: All Active Honkai: Star Rail Redeem Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Honkai: Star Rail Redeem Codes (February 2025)
  • How To Redeem Honkai: Star Rail Codes
  • Stellar Jade In Honkai: Star Rail

Honkai: Star Rail is developed by HoYoverse, the maker of Genshin Impact . This gacha game is a turn-based strategy RPG that's set in the Honkai universe, although it’s not a sequel to Honkai Impact 3rd .

Similar to Genshin Impact which often has some codes, Honkai: Star Rail also features some redeem codes for people to claim on launch day. This article will feature HSR redeem codes , how to redeem them, and other items players will get to begin their Trailblazing journey.

Honkai: Star Rail Redeem Codes (February 2025)

  • EAJJPMN3DDE3 (100 Stellar Jades + 4 Refined Aether)
  • RTKJPM6JVCFF (100 Stellar Jades + 5 Traveler's Guide)

How To Redeem Honkai: Star Rail Codes

To redeem the HSR codes, log in to the Honkai: Star Rail redeem code website https://hsr.hoyoverse.com/gift, then manually input the codes, or simply press on the link to open the redemption site with the code automatically attached to it .

Players should ensure they have already made an account before trying to redeem. Otherwise, the website won't find the desired profile.

Alternatively, once players unlock the in-game menu, there will be a Redemption Code button under Trailblazer Profile , which can be accessed by pressing the menu button next to their MC's name.

Stellar Jade In Honkai: Star Rail

Stellar Jade is the primary currency for Honkai: Star Rail players. In Genshin Impact , it’s equivalent to Primogems, which means people will use it for gacha (called Warp in HSR) and to recover 60 Trailblaze Power, up to eight times per day. Just like in Genshin Impact , each Warp will cost 160 Stellar Jades, and there are two types of Warping currencies; Star Rail Pass and Star Rail Special Pass . The former is used for Standard Warp, while the latter is for Limited Banner, which includes Honkai: Star Rail Seele.

The game features a Beginner Banner for new players, which allows people to gain 50 Warp at the cost of 40. A guaranteed 5-star will also be rewarded after all 40 pulls are performed.

item.title: Fisch Ethereal Abyss Bestiary Guide
item.description:
The developers are trying very hard on Fisch , so each update brings not only new fish and locations but also new mechanics, puzzles, and much more. For example, the Atlantis update offers players a huge location to explore. It has five sub-locations, each of which has unique catches. So, in this guide, we will tell you about the Ethereal Abyss bestiary in Fisch .

It is worth noting that all the fish from this sub-location are part of the Atlantis bestiary. However, you will have to spend quite a lot of time in this Roblox fishing RPG just to catch all the fish in one sub-location.

How to Reach Ethereal Abyss Pool

Although there is a large amount of water in the Atlantis location, players can’t fish everywhere. They need to get to certain pools to catch unique fish species and complete the bestiary. And in the case of the Ethereal Abyss bestiary, you will first have to complete a trial in Fisch .

To do this, you need to jump into the water next to the Atlantis lobby. You can easily recognize the desired pool by the huge statue of an anglerfish. Next, you must swim forward to a huge door that can only be opened by completing a trial.

It requires you to cooperate with another player and simultaneously solve puzzles in the rooms on either side of the door. Fortunately, the puzzles are quite simple, so you can quickly cope with them. But it is worth noting that you will be underwater for quite a long time, so you should use Advances Diving Gear or Water Bubble.

After that, swim through the open door and emerge in a small cave. This way, you will get to the Ethereal Abyss pool and can start completing its bestiary in Fisch .

Fisch Ethereal Abyss Bestiary

Fish Rarity Bait Time Season Weather
Neptune's Nibbler Common Seaweed Day Summer or Spring Clear
Atlantean Sardine Common Any Day Any Any
Aqua Scribe Common Seaweed Day Any Clear
Column Crawler Common Worm Any Any Any
Mosaic Swimmer Uncommon Coral Any Spring Any
Temple Drifter Uncommon Coral Day Any Clear
Echo Fisher Uncommon Shrimp Night Any Foggy
Chronos Deep Swimmer Unusual Truffle Worm Any Any Any
Tentacle Eel Unusual Fish Head Night Any Any
Oracle's Eye Unusual Night Shrimp Night Winter Foggy
Voidscale Guppy Rare Shrimp Night Winter Clear
Starlit Weaver Rare Coral NIght Any Clear
Mage Marlin Legendary Fish Head Night Any Clear
King Jellyfish Mythical Worm Night Winter Clear

item.title: The Sims 4: 8 Ways To Make Sims Stand Out Without Mods Or CC
item.description:
Summary

  • Customize aspirations and traits to create unique Sims with depth and challenge.
  • Purchase game packs for unlimited customization options and new content.
  • Utilize CAS randomizer and maximize small details for unique and realistic Sims.

Eleven years ago, the fourth adaptation of the most popular life simulation franchise, The Sims 4 , was released for players with new levels of creativity and gameplay. Its launch sparked so much excitement (and still does with each expansion) with enhanced graphics, customizability, and even MORE dynamic storytelling options. The Sims 4 stands tall for its unlimited options to create Sims with emotional depth and a platform that allows players to explore millions of identities and experiences each time they play.

While mods and CC can arguably significantly expand the customization options, not every player wants (or needs) to use them. Some prefer the challenge of working without mods or CC, while some players may be worried about game performance. Regardless of the reasons, it's 100% possible to craft the cutest Sims only using the base game and official packs. Here are a few ways to make a player's Sim stand out without mods or custom content.

1 Customize Aspirations And Traits

Unique Personalities For Unique Sims

  • Mix traits to create Sims that stand out thanks to unique personalities.
  • Try choosing aspirations that are harder to achieve to add challenge to the game and depth to the Sim.

Creating Sims that stand out in the game and make for exciting gameplay don't just have cute outfits and look good, they also have personalities and traits that make them more lifelike. Aspirations and traits actively influence actions, desires, and how they interact with the world (and other NPCs). The same way a smile can change an entire persona in real life is the same way traits can change a Sim in the game.

When players go beyond basic traits and layer unique traits, they create complex Sims who will display the traits throughout the game. For example, Bookworm Sims may get inspired while reading anything, leading to fun facial expressions and interesting interactions. These small traits and aspirations can create characters to fall in love with without needing to change a single aesthetic feature.

2 Purchase Sims 4 Game Packs, Expansions, And Kits

Unlimited Customization Options

  • Purchasing packs open up so many more customization options for players.
  • Packs include not just careers and worlds, they include CAS options for better Sim clothing, hair, makeup and accessory options.

EA keeps The Sims 4 fresh with regular releases of packs, expansions, and kits. Each pack adds a ton of new content from gameplay features, worlds, and careers to CAS items - each one contributes to making Sims that just stand out. Some packs cater to straight wardrobe or fashion items, unlocking bonus content for Sims.

The CAS items in purchased packs always follow the theme of the pack. There's a pack for everything, whether its designer collaboration packs, historical packs, children's clothing packs or creator kits, there's so many tools to express player Sims' individuality.

3 Use CAS Randomizer

Start With A Base For Inspiration

  • Create a Sim randomize option makes for a challenge, or easy customizing if lucky.
  • After the randomizer gives players a base Sim, players can adjust appearance, traits, and aspirations to create a fully developed character with inspiration from the game and minimal work.

Surprise Sim? Yes please! The Create a Sim (CAS) randomize option can be so useful for players by giving a starting point not considered before. Players can embrace and enhance unexpected features generated or use them as a backdrop for their vision.

Players can choose the randomize option by clicking the dice icon at the bottom of the CAS step. After the randomizer gives players a base Sim, players can adjust their appearance, traits, and aspirations to create a fully developed Sim with minimal work. This is perfect to get creative juices flowing and to balance between unique Sims and control.

4 Tattoos And Skin Details

Realistic Details For Realistic Sims

  • Add realistic spice and personality to Sims with tattoos and skin details.
  • Strategically placed freckles, skin details, medical wearables, body hair, and tattoos can make ALL the difference.

It's 2025. There's not a single day a tattooed up king or queen walks by on the street. Tattoos and skin details offer a creative way to add real life personality and visual attraction to Sims. From delicate floral designs to tribal geometric patterns, these tattoos can tell a story and reflect Sims' individuality.

Skin details add much needed dimension, realism and depth, making each Sim feel unique. Don't be afraid to experiment with different placements and use all the details available!

5 Create Multiple Outfits For Each Category

Reflect Personality Through Style Choices

  • Create up to five outfits per category.
  • Whether switching fits for a party or to head to the gym, creating multiple outfits makes for multiple fashion show opportunities.

The Sims 4 allows players to create up to five outfits per category (everyday, formal, athletic, sleep, party, and swimwear), providing 25+ opportunities to create the perfect outfit combination. Giving Sims a diverse wardrobe is a MUST for showcasing their personality and adapting to different situations. This is exceptionally helpful for players who want to balance between styles, whether that be cottagecore or Y2k.

Each outfit can have different details, like hair, makeup, and accessories to account for a ton of gameplay scenarios. Players can switch between outfits at any point during the game, allowing for changes based on the situation. Sims will ALWAYS be dressed for the occasion and express their unique style.

6 Maximize Small Details

Accessories, Makeup, And Small Facial Details

  • Small details make a big difference.
  • Pay attention to how the details interact with one another.

Think of Sims like a work of art, the accessories, makeup, and subtle facial details are just the finishing touches. A touch of eyeliner that screams "I am a Boss Babe!" Freckles and small facial details can add a layer of realistic depth to just make Sims stand out. Players will find that even the smallest details will create a cohesive look that tells a story.

Pro tip: Don't slap on just anything, think energy. Think of combinations that go together. A Sim with mismatched makeup, a fuzzy hat for cold weather or accessories make a Sim look in disarray (unless that's the look players are trying to achieve).

7 Occult Features

Mermaids, Werewolves, And Vampires

  • The Sims 4 adds a TON of occult features to gameplay. Ghosts, aliens, mermaids, witches, plant Sims, servo, spell casters, werewolves and vampires are apart of the roster.
  • Don't stick to the basics, use these features to make Sims sparkle (literally).

Let's get spooky, scary, or even sparkly. Sims 4 occult features are a powerful feature to enhance Sims. The packs give players the power to unleash the supernatural into the game. We're talking about mermaids with sparkly scales, beastly hair werewolves, and vampires with a bloodlust and gothic flair.

These occult features are cosmetic masterpieces and add a whole new player of gameplay and storytelling. Turn Sims into pale artists or bright green aliens for dramatic gameplay.

8 Detail Edit Mode

Fine Tune Facial Features

  • This is where the MAGIC happens.
  • Sculpting facial features to make ideal Sim.

The Detail Edit Mode in CAS is the gateway to creating Sims so stunning, so unique, and so perfectly them, that players will want to frame gameplay screenshots all the time. Players can tweak the smallest details on the face and body, curves on eyebrows, the slope on a nose, and the pout of a lip - it's all up to the player.

Don't be afraid to experiment with Detail Edit Mode. A tiny adjustment can transform a Sim from cute to captivating. Subtle changes can make them look mysterious or mischievous. This is about crafting characters and giving Sims the features that tell their story.
